snippet.title: Trailer What A Ball
snippet.description:
What A Ball Game is a different kind of ball racing game. Follow Blue's adventure running against MORE THAN 600 Balls racing together. Be the Ball: Crash, jump, bounce and run up to 300 Km per hour. It's a very challenging and hardcore game, if don't believe us, just try it. Enjoy the epic story about Blue, get a higher score and find extra bonuses when you finish the story. In this one-player game, you will find beautiful minimalistic stages full of colour. And don't forget the sound On.

Coming soon on Steam
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2197830/What_A_Ball/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/What_a_ball
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/what.a_ball/
